title: Steranko - Arte Noir
description:
'Steranko - Arte Noir'

Semana Negra and Vanguard Productions, 2002, 198 pages

Illustrated by Jim Steranko

Written by Jim Steranko, J David Spurlock, Angel de la Calle, Michael Chabon, Francisco Naranjo, Ruben Paniceres, Juame Vaguer, Lorenzo F Diaz

The first section of this book (118 pages) is a Jim Steranko biography. It moves through his young life fairly quickly and then does an exceptional job breaking down and detailing his history in, and importance to the comic book industry. This section is presented in two columns with the left being Spanish and the right in English (Amazon says it's Italian, but my copy is definitely Spanish).

Next is a short 'Essential Art Bibliography' section. (5 pages)

The third section is a high quality Steranko portfolio. (74 pages)
